attributes.action: give more advice and info to doctors and parents
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
on what medical evidence is needed and whom from before being able to get a statement. To help schools give these children the best education that they deserve.
As many children are going through the net and getting lost as far as education is concerned.
This has goto stop and more help,infomation etc has goto be made more easyer and at hand to everyone.
